author: andschwa
body: ## Remove conflicting aliases for Linux and OS X The aliases which conflict with Linux native commands were consolidated and removed with the pre-processor definition `LINUX`. Additionally, several "conflicts" are purposefully kept and likewise consolidated. They are kept because Bash itself stomps on the native commands with its own built-ins, and so we're adopting the same behavior. Resolves #567. ## Remove A:...Z: drive functions on Linux / OS X Resolves #612. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/786)
title: Fix aliases
